pullRequest.title: Add UTF8 support for .properties files
pullRequest.bodyText: Based on edaa4f6, this allows messages files to be read in UTF8 without the need for native2ascii conversion. This also removes the native2ascii-maven-plugin, previously used to convert Crowdin translations to a compatible format. I've tested this briefly and it appears to work correctly with both internal translations and custom messages.

commit.message:
Add UTF8 support for .properties files
Based on https://github.com/EssentialsX/Essentials/commit/edaa4f6978b2e6d091919f775b4907d159437116, this allows messages files to be read in UTF8 without the need for native2ascii conversion.
Remove conversion of properties files during build
